explains: n. （Westward）（英、美）韦史特华尔德（人名）

sentences.en: Wind and waves keep pushing him westward when he wants to go south toward the Solomon lslands.
sentences.cn: 当他想向南前往所罗门群岛时，风浪不断将他推向西边。

sentences.en: During periods when commodity prices were high, the rate of westward migration increased spectacularly.
sentences.cn: 在商品价格较高的时期，西迁的速度大幅增长。

sentences.en: "Old America seemed to be breaking up and moving westward," observed an English visitor in 1817, during the first great wave of migration.
sentences.cn: 1817年，在第一次移民大潮中，一位英国游客观察到：“古老的美洲似乎正在分裂并向西移动。”
